title: Senior Software Engineer
description: We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for developing scalable web applications, mentoring junior developers, and contributing to architectural decisions.
requirements:
- 5+ years of experience in software development
- Strong knowledge of Python, JavaScript, React
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS/Azure)
- Excellent problem-solving skills

title: Bank Manager
description: Seeking an experienced Bank Manager to oversee branch operations, manage customer relationships, and ensure compliance with banking regulations.
requirements:
- MBA in Finance or related field
- 3-5 years of banking experience
- Strong leadership and communication skills
- Knowledge of banking regulations

title: IAS Officer
description: Join the Indian Administrative Service and serve the nation. Responsible for policy implementation, administration, and public service delivery.
requirements:
- Bachelor degree from recognized university
- Age between 21-32 years
- Clear UPSC Civil Services Examination
- Indian citizenship required

title: Staff Nurse
description: Provide compassionate patient care in our multi-specialty hospital. Opportunity to work with advanced medical technology and experienced healthcare professionals.
requirements:
- B.Sc Nursing or GNM certification
- Valid nursing license
- 1-2 years experience preferred
- Good communication skills

title: Data Scientist
description: Join our AI/ML team to build innovative data science solutions. Work with large datasets and cutting-edge machine learning algorithms.
requirements:
- Masters in Data Science/Statistics/Computer Science
- 3+ years in data science
- Python, R, SQL expertise
- Machine learning experience
